section.name: java.net tasks project

ol.li: a Java library that provides programatic acess to the web interface of java.net
a set of Ant tasks on top of it.
other tools to help automate various simple mindless jobs

section.p: For example, with Ant tasks, one can post a new file to the file sharing section as a part of your nightly automatic build process, or adding e-mail addresses to a particular mailing list, and etc.
Another example is to combine one of the tools to procmail so that you can automatically approve/decline new role requests based on pre-defined rules.
